overview:
Martin is founder and CEO of gogol medien, a pioneer in cloud-based print publishing and citizen journalism. Prior to gogol he co-founded a service-company for mobile solutions.

Martin Huber earned a Dipl.-Ing. in Electrical Engineering at the Technical University of Munich, a Ph.D. in Management at the Ludwig-Maximilians-University Munich and studied at Sloan School of Management, MIT. After completing his studies in Electical Engineering he was working at the Center for Digital Technology and Management and coordinated the CDTM study program.
